alert.note: Alert for Alger (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued May 01 at 4:33AM EDT until May 02 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 14 inches, greatest inland from Lake Superior to the west of Forest Highway 13. North winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Alger County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult to impossible due to slushy snow accumulations on roads. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes today and the morning commute on Tuesday. With heavy, wet snow collecting on trees and powerlines, the strong winds will cause tree damage and power outages. The snow will also be difficult to move.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
